description.narrative: Strengthened national capacities and systems for results based planning, coordination and performance management including Emergency Preparedness & Response at national level and in 12 targeted States, which contributes to Children In Urban Settings / Local Governance, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Public Finance And Local Governance. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: At least 3.8 million of the most vulnerable children (girls and boys) including children affected by humanitarian crisis have access and use scaled-up proven sustainable, high impact, integrated quality services for life saving, learning, development and protection in the most deprived localities in Sudan.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened national capacities and systems for results based planning, coordination and performance management including Emergency Preparedness & Response at national level and in 12 targeted States

description.narrative: Results based planning and management has been enhanced in 2017 in 12 states of UNICEF's priority geographical focus of multi sector integrated interventions in favor of vulnerable children, with programme performance monitoring strengthened to enhanced accountability for efficiency and accountability of equitable results. | Status:Met | As-of Date:16/01/2018
